scripts.setup: npm run client-install && npm run server-install && npm run db-install
scripts.db-install: cd "database collection creator" && npm install && cd ..
scripts.server: cd server && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.client: cd client && npm run start && cd ..
scripts.start: cd server && npm run server-start && cd ..
scripts.client-build: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.post-install: npm run client-install && npm run server-install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run post-install && npm run client-build
scripts.electron-dev: concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && electron ."
